description: Run cloud compliance audits across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Discover provider-specific audit controls and execute targeted checks to surface misconfigurations and risks. Streamline multi-cloud security assessments with fast, repeatable evaluations.

capabilities.name: rootGet
capabilities.description: A simple health check endpoint to confirm the service is running.

capabilities.name: listToolsToolsGet
capabilities.description:
Provides a structured, machine-readable list of all available audit controls,
categorized by cloud provider. This is the primary discovery endpoint for an agent.

capabilities.name: auditAwsAuditAwsPost
capabilities.description:
Executes a list of specified audit controls for Amazon Web Services.

This endpoint accepts parameters and/or request body.

capabilities.name: auditAzureAuditAzurePost
capabilities.description:
Executes a list of specified audit controls for Microsoft Azure.

This endpoint accepts parameters and/or request body.

capabilities.name: auditGcpAuditGcpPost
capabilities.description:
Executes a list of specified audit controls for Google Cloud Platform.

This endpoint accepts parameters and/or request body.
